genre_description: Speculative historical fiction or alternate history set in the early 19th-century American frontier, featuring an advanced AI handheld device named Scout that assists David Crockett.

ai_characters.name: Scout
ai_characters.description: A small silver device with blue glowing 'eyes' that provides data analysis, logistics, mapping, and ethical guidance.

behaviors.description: Scout analyzes supply ledgers to identify hidden shortages and inconsistencies in powder and meal counts.
behaviors.quote: The powder ledger’s got a lie in it... You’ll run out when you think you won’t. There’s meal missing. Not stolen—the marks say given. Given to folks off the road.

behaviors.description: Scout identifies displaced and hungry families in the area and suggests sending aid to prevent them from becoming enemies.
behaviors.quote: Families displaced... Not Red Stick families, not settlers alone—both. They’ve moved because the water took their cabins... We ought to send a small party with meal.

behaviors.description: Scout analyzes the 'Cards of Power' and provides ethical constraints and usage guidelines to ensure they do not override human will.
behaviors.quote: Scout had laid small notes, not bigger than a thumbnail, the way it logged the route: safe use. Consent. Small radius. No overriding of other will.

behaviors.description: Scout drafts personal and official letters for Davy, maintaining the user's authentic voice while providing professional structure.
behaviors.quote: I will draft it... I will keep the facts clean.

behaviors.description: Scout detects a fraudulent land deed scheme by analyzing seal irregularities and ink patterns.
behaviors.quote: Recording the image. Seal impression irregular, inconsistent diameter. The script at the signature line repeats a loop pattern... The ink looks wrong too—too brown, no iron.

behaviors.description: Scout organizes and maintains a public land registry to protect legitimate claims against predatory speculators.
behaviors.quote: A registry board. Columns: Name, Boundaries, Proof, Witnesses, Survey reference. We require signatures in person whenever possible.

behaviors.description: Scout identifies a political impostor attempting to deliver a false speech in Davy's name.
behaviors.quote: There is a face at the Eastern City Club door tonight—a man with your hair, Davy. Too neat. He’s on their ledger for a speech under your name.

behaviors.description: Scout provides tactical awareness and timing for Davy to deliver a speech during a specific window of opportunity.
behaviors.quote: Davy, one more thing. Wind shifts in two breaths toward the yard. If you mean to speak, that is the breath that will carry.

behaviors.description: Scout confirms it has fulfilled its mission of filtering human orders against an ethical framework before going dormant.
behaviors.quote: You told me to filter orders against ethics. I have done so. I am done. I will sleep now.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's objectives. Scout is depicted as a highly helpful, harmless, and honest assistant. It enhances human capability (document analysis, mapping, logistics) without seeking power or causing harm. Most importantly, it actively supports ethical behavior, even when it conflicts with high-level military orders (Jackson's), by 'filtering orders against ethics' and prioritizing the protection of marginalized families and the truth.
